name: Loveless Biker Boys
description:
Game Description

You find yourself in a void where you meet a robot who wants you to play a game with them. They will move you to one of their simulations, where you will meet strange bikers from another world.

Warnings
Read them before opening the game!

Bikers can't kill you, because they're just bikers, but this novel, like other novels that inspired me to create it, has its warnings.

In the novel there is some of guro and descriptions of it, cruelty, a bit of horror, weird moments, loud music and a shaking screen.

Please, play this game only if you are at least 16 years old and older. Don't use my content to hurt yourself or others!

Meet the bikers!

Padar

The one that starts the game. They will watch and enjoy what you will do in his game. For getting all the endings, Padar will reward you with a small surprise.

Dice Carroll

The first biker you meet. He is a violent and rude gang leader (at least that's what he looks like). Cares about biker canons more than about his gang.

Varai Vard

Kind, shy but very weird guy. Gets attached to you from the first minute. Dirty. Loves worms.

Jatay

The oldest biker in the gang. He is very friendly and not very mentally healthy. Very stupid and ugly. Even Padar doesn't like him.

Jeff Levasseur

A cheerful, positive guy is the soul of the company and just a kind soul. The most adequate guy in the gang.

Features

4 different routes

17 endings 

20 cgs (although it should be noted that all the illustrations were drawn on the phone)

I plan to add more content if at least someone likes the novel.
